io.github.struppigel.tools.anomalies

Interface COFFHeaderScanning


  • public interface COFFHeaderScanning
    Scans the COFF File Header for anomalies.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkCharacteristics(COFFFileHeader coff)
      Checks the file characteristics for deprecated and reserved flags.
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkDeprecated(COFFHeaderKey key, COFFFileHeader coff, AnomalySubType subtype)
      Checks if the value for the given key is set in the coff file header.
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkNumberOfSections(COFFFileHeader coff)
      Checks the section number maximum value.
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkPEHeaderLocation(COFFFileHeader coff)
      Checks if the PE Headers are in the expected location, meaning after the MSDOS stub and before the sections.
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkSizeOfOptHeader(COFFFileHeader coff)
      Checks for a collapsed Optional Header and if the SizeOfOptionalHeader is unnecessarily large.
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkTimeStamp(COFFFileHeader coff)
      Checks if the time stamp is too low or in the future TODO add future time stamp
      scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> scan() 
      java.lang.String scanReport()

      • checkCharacteristics

        scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkCharacteristics(COFFFileHeader coff)
        Checks the file characteristics for deprecated and reserved flags.

        Parameters:
        coff - coff file header
        Returns:
        anomaly list

      • checkDeprecated

        scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkDeprecated(COFFHeaderKey key,
                                                         COFFFileHeader coff,
                                                         AnomalySubType subtype)
        Checks if the value for the given key is set in the coff file header. Returns a DeprecatedAnomaly if it is.

        This method doesn't know if the given fields are deprecated or not. It just assumes they are.

        Parameters:
        key - the key of the coff file header field that shall be checked.
        coff -
        subtype - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        anomaly list

      • checkPEHeaderLocation

        scala.collection.immutable.List<Anomaly> checkPEHeaderLocation(COFFFileHeader coff)
        Checks if the PE Headers are in the expected location, meaning after the MSDOS stub and before the sections.

        Parameters:
        coff - the coff file header
        Returns:
        list of anomalies
